title: Gentleman Gnar - Skin Bug?
body:
Hey fellow Gnar and Skin enthusiasts, 

I thought I'd bring up something that irked me a little.  I am not trying to be too picky about the new Gnar skin--after all it's only a 975 cost. 

When Gnar is about to transform, he runs on his fours as we all know, but with the classic and Dino skins, he goes through 2-3 stages of colors leading to his change.  With the Gentleman Gnar; it feels inconsistent.

For example, I've experienced a few times where I find myself quickly glancing at my champion while we're in a tense stalemate waiting for the first move.  Gnar goes sometimes a mix of white and dark red first, then all dark red.  Other times it seems like it's in reverse or it just does one or the other.  With the intense moments, I screw up sometimes while trying to time my bounce transform perfectly from attempted muscle memory to what I see.  I know, it sounds silly, however I started to pay closer attention and noticed the errors. 

Was this unintended, or just the way that it is? 

Thanks! 

PS; love the skin otherwise, especially the back animation with Mega Gnar recall xD

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is absolutely a bug and we're working on a fix to make this transition a bit smoother. :]
I guess this should be posted into the "report-a-bug-forum",this one is for fanmade skin and champion concepts.
Hm, as a person who bought Gnar at launch with his skin and found out I was trash with it him... I have no idea. I'll bump and see if we can find a solution :D

I try not to bump my own posts, but I'm still very curious if there is any feedback from my OP.

Thanks again.
